message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think it would be a great fit for you, let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $120 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go quite that low.  How about we meet in the middle at $160?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still not able to go above $120 for the product. I hope we can find a mutual agreement closer to my budget.
